sourcesContent: import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SudokuGeneratorService } from 'src/app/service/sudoku-generator.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sudoku-grid', templateUrl: './sudoku-grid.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sudoku-grid.component.scss'], }) export class SudokuGridComponent implements OnInit { //grid: any[][]; @Input() grid: any[][] = []; answergrid: any[] = []; constructor(private sudokuGeneratorService: SudokuGeneratorService) { // this.grid = this.sudokuGeneratorService.generateSudoku(); } ngOnInit() { this.answergrid = this.sudokuGeneratorService.generatePuzzleWith25Clues( this.grid ); } validateInput(event: Event, row: number, col: number) { const input = event.target as HTMLInputElement; const value = input.value; if (!/^[1-9]$/.test(value)) { input.value = ''; this.grid[row][col] = ''; } else { this.grid[row][col] = value; } } }
